appFunc.question: Does the application perform multiple functions ?
appFunc.description: Examples of possible application functions may are Customer/partner portal, Knowledge base, E-commerceBusiness to business (B2B) and Web-Services communication
appFunc.name: app-func

uriFunc.question: Are multiple functions accessed through specific URI's?
uriFunc.description: In some cases different application functions can be accessed through different URIs. For example, web portal functionality will be accessed through: www.example.com/portal, whilst a KB will be accessed through: www.example.com/kb.
uriFunc.name: uri-func

multiHttpFunc.question: Are multiple functions accessed through specific HTTP parameters?
multiHttpFunc.description: In some cases different application functions can be accessed through different HTTP parameters.For example, web portal will be accessed will be accessed through: www.example.com/en?function=portal,whilst a KB will be accessed through:www.example.com/en?function=kb
multiHttpFunc.name: multi-http-func

specificHttpFunc.question: Are application specific functions accessed through specific HTTP parameters?
specificHttpFunc.description: In some cases different application functions can be accessed through different HTTP parameters.For example, web portal will be accessed will be accessed through: www.example.com/en?function=portal,whilst a KB will be accessed through:www.example.com/en?function=kb
specificHttpFunc.name: specific-http-func
